titles: A free discourse against customary swearing ; and, A dissuasive from cursing by Robert Boyle ; published by John Williams.
author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
publisher: Printed by R.R. for Thomas Cockerill Senr and Junr,
notes: "A dissuasive from cursing" (30 p. at end) probably not by Boyle. cf. Brit. mus. Cat. and Fulton, J.F. A bibliography of the Honourable Robert Boyle, p. 135.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
